Title: Fibonacci Numbers
Description:
The Fibonacci numbers can be defined as follows: 
 
F_0=0
F_1=1
F_n = F_{n-2}+F_{n-1}
 
 Your task is to calculate the value of F_n for a given n.
Input Specification: The only input line has an integer n.
Output Specification: Print the value of F_n modulo 10^9+7.
